title: Con-way Freight Promotes Jill Bixby to Vice President of Western Area Sales
text:
Con-way Freight
ANN ARBOR, Mich. , Sept. 3, Con-way Freight, the less-than-truckload (LTL) carrier and subsidiary of Con-way Inc. (NYSE: CNW), announced that Jill A. Bixby has been promoted to vice president of western area sales.
A 17-year Con-way veteran, Bixby began her career with the company in 1998 as a customer service representative. She most recently served as director of sales, with responsibility for sales activities in the Pacific Northwest.
In her new role, she oversees sales for Con-way Freight's Western Area, which includes the 11 states in the western U.S., as well as North Dakota , South Dakota , Minnesota and Texas . Leading a team of over 130 sales professionals, her responsibilities as the region's sales leader will include pricing and sales strategies, as well as staffing, performance management, customer acquisition, sales training and personnel development. Based in Portland, Oregon , she reports to Stephen F. Dean , senior vice president of sales for Con-way Freight.
"Jill is an excellent complement to our executive team," said Dean. "She is a seasoned sales professional whose insight and experience will provide strong leadership and development for our sales efforts in the Western Area. I'm pleased to congratulate Jill on this significant career milestone and look forward to her contributions."
Bixby's career at Con-way has spanned several roles of increasing responsibility. She is a five-time recipient of Con-way Freight's Quarterly Leadership Award, a two-time recipient of Sales Director of the Year honors and a past recipient of Con-way Freight's President's Award - one of the company's highest accolades, which recognize employees for exemplary leadership and performance.
Follow Con-way Freight on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/CNWFreight .
Con-way Freight equipment images are available at: https://www.con-way.com/brand_standards/pictures_logos_and_icons/con-way-freight-equipment .
About Con-way Freight
Con-way Freight is the industry's leading less-than-truckload (LTL) freight transportation company, providing guaranteed, day-definite regional and transcontinental service with exception-free delivery, on-time service performance and faster transit times through a single, unified network of more than 425 service locations serving the United States , Canada , Mexico and Puerto Rico . Con-way Freight offers LTL freight transportation across North America and through Global LTL ™ delivery in the United States from around the world. Global solutions include international less-than-container (LCL) ocean shipments from Asia through its OceanGuaranteed ® service; U.S. and Europe delivery for inbound and outbound international cargoes through an exclusive alliance with TNT; direct service to more than 30 Bahamian and Caribbean ports; and domestic offshore transportation to Alaska , Hawaii and Puerto Rico . Based in Ann Arbor, Michigan , Con-way Freight is a certified FAST highway carrier and is C-TPAT/PIP, ACE- and CSA-certified.
Con-way Freight is a subsidiary of Con-way Inc. (NYSE: CNW), a $5.8 billion diversified freight transportation and logistics services company. For more information, visit www.con-way.com/en/freight .
